function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Expense of negative-pressure mechanical ventilation","Impact":"Limited protection against contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Exploration of alternative environmental control measures","Technologies":"Natural ventilation, upper-room UV light, negative air ionizers","People":"Building owners, healthcare facilities","Owner":"Architects, environmental engineers"},{"Description":"Climate dependency of natural ventilation","Impact":"Reduced protection in certain climates","Mitigation":"Supplementing natural ventilation with other environmental control measures","Technologies":"Climate control systems, hybrid ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants, healthcare facilities","Owner":"Architects, HVAC engineers"},{"Description":"Limited use of upper-room UV light in healthcare facilities","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness in reducing TB transmission","Mitigation":"Conducting efficacy studies in clinical settings","Technologies":"Upper-room UV light systems, medical researchers","People":"Healthcare facilities, medical researchers","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, research institutions"}]}
